definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of Davidic king, Messiah, ‖[[משׁפט]], Ps 72:1, Ps 72:3, Is 9:6, Je 23:5, Je 33:15.

God's attribute as sovereign Ps 36:7, Ps 71:19; in government, [[עשׂה]] ´[[משׁפט וח]] Ps 99:4, Je 9:23; administering justice Job 37:28; punishment Is 1:27, Is 5:16, Is 10:22, Is 28:17, Da 9:7; vindication of his people Mic 7:9.

righteousness, in a case or cause, [[בחדקתי החזקתי]] Job 27:6 on my righteousness I hold fast; ´[[מה ישׁ לי עוד ח]] 2Sa 19:29 what right have I yet ? of God's judgments, ´[[הגיד ח]] Is 57:12 (iron.); ´[[השׁיב ח]] 1Sa 26:23, Job 33:26; ´[[כּח]], [[השׁיב]] 2Sa 22:25, [[גמל]] v:2Sa 22:21, [[נתן]] 1Ki 8:52 = 2Ch 6:23.
righteousness = truthfulness, ´[[באמת ובח]] Is 48:1, Zec 8:8; in word Is 45:28, Is 63:1, oath Je 4:2.

definitions.body: of God ‖[[יׇשַׁע]], [[תְּשׁוּעָה]], [[יְשׁוּעָה]] Is 45:8, Is 46:13, Is 51:6 +7 t. definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of people, = prosperity, ‖[[הון]], [[עשׁר]] Pr 8:18; ´[[מוֹרֶה לח]] early rain for prosperity Joe 2:23.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God Ju Jdg 5:11, Jdg 5:11, 1Sa 12:7, Mic 6:5; vindication of right Ps 103:6; redemptive Is 45:24, Da 9:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man's moral conduct Is 64:5, Je 51:10, also prob. Ez Eze 3:20, Eze 18:24, Eze 33:13 (Kt sg.) Ps 11:7 (? gloss), Da 9:18; as adv. acc., [[הׂלֵח חְדָקוֹת]] Is 33:15.
